B1.body: Thank you for coming. Here we can speak openly and without fear of extra ears.
B1.speaker: Bellgates

B1(1).body: Why do you need robotic Ministers?
B1(1).speaker: Strikely

B2.body: Don't you find them funny? Specially Fluttershy, she is so cute…
B2.speaker: Bellgates

B3.body: I bought them at an auction. Once they entertained visitors to the amusement park, but after the opening of the freeway, the park went bankrupt.
B3.speaker: Bellgates

B4.body: Okay, that's not why you're here...
B4.speaker: Bellgates

B5.body: It's time to tell you the reason, why I left MAS. One of the most awful secrets of Twilight's Ministry is that they created a Megaspell using Ministry of Peace developments.
B5.speaker: Bellgates

B6.body: This megaspell may burn out a huge area in one blow, and its remnants will hinder the existence of most organisms for a very long time.
B6.speaker: Bellgates

B7.body: Their use implies the complete and almost instantaneous destruction of one or even several countries.
B7.speaker: Bellgates

B7(2).body: So the war will soon end in victory?
B7(2).speaker: Strikely

B8.body: I totally agree. I didn't want to be a participant in mass destruction and so I left.
B8.speaker: Bellgates

B9.body: You don't realize what it can lead to. I've done the calculations. After this megaspells we may well fight the next war with sticks and stones. No one should have such power, they must be stopped.
B9.speaker: Bellgates

B10.body: I contacted some acquaintances and found that blueprints to this megaspell are now in one of the MAS bases. This base is very well guarded, but you shouldn't have any problems with it…
B10.speaker: Bellgates

B10(1).body: Are you suggesting me to break in there and steal the blueprints?
B10(1).speaker: Strikely

B11.body: I propose to sneak into this base, find the blueprints and destroy them in such a way that not a trace of them remains.
B11.speaker: Bellgates

B11(1).body: It's a betrayal. If I'm discovered…

B12.body: You're a professional, aren't you? Besides, I'm going to give you equipment of our own design specially for you. They won't find you with it, and if they do, they won't recognize you.

B13.body: Then, I'm afraid, very soon the whole world will be engulfed in the fire of hundreds of such megaspells. Almost none of us will survive. And in part it will already be your fault, because you knew about it, but decided to do nothing.
